app_name: Warren Heathcote AI & Aluminium Innovation Hub
description: Premier executive command center integrating strategic leadership, AI-driven business intelligence, luxury lifestyle management, creative wellness initiatives, and comprehensive SharePoint/Xero integration for Warren Heathcote and family.
capabilities: Executive dashboard with real-time business intelligence
AI-powered chat assistant for strategic insights
Dual-persona management (Warren Executive + Yanika Creative Oasis)
SharePoint library management with futuristic UI
Xero financial integration with real-time analytics
Dermatology AI chatbot for skincare advice

workflows.name: Executive Dashboard Access
workflows.description: Provide Warren with comprehensive executive command center
steps: System displays dual-access options (Executive vs Creative)
Load executive dashboard with real-time metrics
Display innovation strategy, motorsport, luxury, and investment sections
workflows.outputs: Executive dashboard with 4 strategic sections and real-time analytics

workflows.name: Creative Wellness Management
workflows.description: Yanika's comprehensive wellness and beauty management hub
workflows.outputs: Wellness dashboard with AI chatbot, marketing analytics, and content management

workflows.name: SharePoint Integration
workflows.description: Seamless SharePoint library access with modern UI
steps: System opens SharePoint in optimized iframe or new tab
workflows.outputs: Direct SharePoint access with usage analytics

workflows.name: Xero Financial Analytics
workflows.description: Real-time financial data integration and visualization
steps: Fetch invoices, cash flow, and profitability data
workflows.outputs: Financial dashboard with real-time metrics and actionable insights

workflows.name: AI-Powered Dermatology Consultation
workflows.description: Provide personalized skincare advice using AI
steps: AI analyzes query and Dubai climate factors
Provide product suggestions and routine advice
workflows.triggers: User asks question in Derma AI chatbot
workflows.outputs: Personalized skincare advice with Dubai climate considerations

workflows.name: Marketing Campaign Management
workflows.description: Track and optimize Instagram marketing campaigns
steps: Enable campaign creation and budget management
workflows.outputs: Campaign performance dashboard with budget tracking and insights

business_rules.name: Dual-Persona Access Control
business_rules.description: Separate executive and creative workspaces with distinct themes
business_rules.action: Load appropriate theme (diamond gold for Warren, Dubai pink-purple for Yanika)

business_rules.name: SharePoint Iframe Optimization
business_rules.description: Optimize UI for both standalone and SharePoint iframe embedding
business_rules.condition: Detect if running in iframe or SharePoint environment
business_rules.action: Adjust layout, animations, and content density accordingly

business_rules.name: Real-Time Data Synchronization
business_rules.description: Keep Xero financial data and SharePoint analytics up-to-date
business_rules.condition: User views financial or SharePoint sections
business_rules.action: Fetch latest data from respective APIs

business_rules.name: AI Response Personalization
business_rules.description: Tailor AI responses based on user context and persona
business_rules.action: Use persona-specific knowledge base and tone (Executive vs Wellness)

business_rules.name: Dubai Climate Awareness
business_rules.description: All dermatology recommendations consider Dubai's climate
business_rules.action: Include Dubai-specific advice (sun protection, hydration, heat management)

integrations.purpose: Financial data, invoicing, and cash flow analytics
Social media analytics and marketing campaign management
AI chatbot, content generation, and analytics
Business intelligence and company data (via Xero integration)

api_endpoints.purpose: AI chatbot conversations for both Executive and Wellness personas
Xero financial data endpoints (invoices, contacts, accounts)
SharePoint library usage analytics and statistics
Instagram engagement metrics and campaign performance

data_models.name: Creative Wellness Hub
data_models.description: Yanika's wellness and beauty management data
